title: Remarks by President Biden Before Marine One Departure | The White House
content: South Lawn5:33 P.M. ESTQ    What do you think about the situation on the border between Poland and Belarus?THE PRESIDENT:  I think it’s of great concern.  We’ve communicated our concern to Russia, and we’ve communicated our concern to Belarus.  And we think it’s a problem.5:33 P.M. EST
